SELECT oi.id, oi.code, oi.commodity_id AS commodityId, oi.price, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, oi.create_date AS createDate, ci.`code` AS commodityCode, ci.`name`, ci.type, ci.images, ci.content, ci.on_put AS onPut, si.introduction, si.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, su.user_name AS shopName, su.avatar AS shopAvatar, ai.address, ai.`name` AS taskUserName, ai.phone FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON ( ai.id = oi.address_id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info su ON ( su.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND su.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.shopName},'%')
AND ci.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.commodityName},'%')
AND oi.order_status = #{orderInfo.orderStatus}
AND ci.type = #{orderInfo.type}
ORDER BY oi.create_date

SELECT oi.`code`, oi.commodity_id AS commodityId, oi.price, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, oi.create_date AS createDate, ci.`code` AS commodityCode, ci.`name`, ci.type, ci.images, ci.content, ci.on_put AS onPut, si.introduction, si.tag, su.user_name AS shopName, su.avatar AS shopAvatar FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info su ON ( su.id = si.user_id ) WHERE oi.user_id = #{ userId }

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, COUNT( oi.`code` ) AS count, IFNULL( SUM( oi.price ), 0 ) AS orderPrice FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
SELECT count( 1 ) AS orderNum, IFNULL( SUM( oi.price ), 0 ) AS orderPrice FROM order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m' )

SELECT COUNT( oi.commodity_id ) AS orderNum, IFNULL( SUM( oi.price ), 0 ) AS orderPrice, ci.`name` FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY oi.commodity_id

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS orderNum, IFNULL( SUM( oi.price ), 0 ) AS orderPrice, ui.avatar, ui.user_name, si.tag, si.introduction FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY si.id

SELECT COUNT( 1 ) AS orderNum, IFNULL( SUM( oi.price ), 0 ) AS orderPrice, ci.`name` FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( ci.id = oi.commodity_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND CI.shop_id = #{ shopId } GROUP BY ci.id
SELECT si.id, ui.avatar, ui.user_name AS userName FROM shop_info si LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT oi.id AS orderId, ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, ci.price, oi.create_date, ci.on_put, ci.type, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) WHERE oi.order_status = 1 AND oi.user_id = #{ userId }

SELECT oi.code AS orderCode, oi.id AS orderId, oi.create_date AS orderDate, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, ci.price, ci.create_date, ci.on_put, ci.type, si.id AS shopId, ui.id AS userId, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, ai.address, ai.name AS takeUser, ai.phone FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN address_info ai ON ( ai.id = oi.address_id ) WHERE oi.id in
#{id}

SELECT oi.id AS orderId, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, oi.create_date AS createDate, ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, oi.price, ci.on_put, ci.type, si.id AS shopId, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, eva.id AS evaluationStatus, eva.content AS evaluationContent FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN evaluation eva ON (eva.order_id = oi.id) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.order_status != 1 AND oi.user_id = #{ userId }

SELECT oi.id AS orderId, oi.order_status AS orderStatus, oi.create_date AS createDate, ci.id, ci.`name`, ci.images, ci.content, oi.price, ci.on_put, ci.type, si.id AS shopId, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar, ui1.user_name AS buyer, eva.id AS evaluationStatus, eva.content AS evaluationContent FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci ON ( oi.commodity_id = ci.id ) LEFT JOIN shop_info si ON ( si.id = ci.shop_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = si.user_id ) LEFT JOIN user_info ui1 ON ( ui1.id = oi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN evaluation eva ON ( eva.order_id = oi.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.order_status != 1 AND ui.id = #{ userId }
